messages.messageBody:
Pop on over to the LJ, look under Friends, and find the entry that announces getting a great deal on a digital camera (I've lost the title... it's a long one... starts with "Holy Crap"). It's currently the first entry:
http://www.livejournal.com/community/shq_spy_office/friends

Impressive, I think. :-D

phil
